MonsterTrait.Name: Charge
MonsterTrait.Text: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Labyrinthine Recall
MonsterTrait.Text: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Siege Monster
MonsterTrait.Text: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The goristro makes three attacks: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

MonsterAction.Name: Fist
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hoof
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterAction.Name: Gore
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 45 (7d10 + 7) piercing damage.
